about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate developer creating digital solutions that bridge innovation and functionality
about.description1: Professional coffee-to-code converter with expertise in Data Engineering, Full-Stack Development, and Making Servers Cry.
about.description2: Currently taming data monsters at XponentL Data (Genpact), where I convince Databricks and Apache Airflow to play nice together. I specialize in turning "it works on my machine" into "it works everywhere" (most of the time).
about.warning: Warning: May cause excessive use of console.log() and random bursts of excitement when code actually works!
